content.GUI_tutorial_filters: Use these buttons to explore the available profiles. Search by category, name, or special criteria.
content.GUI_tutorial_zones: Select one of the available albums to view a list of videos and photos.
content.GUI_tutorial_details: Here is the important information of the selected profile.
content.GUI_tutorial_save: Use this button to add or remove this profile from your SAVED list.
content.GUI_tutorial_special_scroll: TIP: swipe up or down on your device trackpad to scroll a list.
content.GUI_tutorial_special_double_tap: TIP: double tap on your device trackpad to select elements inside a list.
content.ERROR_server: Sorry, an error has occured while trying to access the server.
content.ERROR_server_timeout: Sorry, connection to server timed out.
content.ERROR_problem_asset: Sorry, we had a problem recovering the current photo.
content.ERROR_wrong_login: Sorry, your login information is not valid.
content.ERROR_empty_email: The email field cannot be empty.
content.ERROR_invalid_email: The email does not have the correct format.
content.ERROR_empty_password: The password field cannot be empty.
content.ERROR_wrong_email: Sorry, this email address does not exist in our database.
content.ERROR_signup_empty_username: The username field cannot be empty
content.ERROR_signup_empty_email: The email field cannot be empty
content.ERROR_signup_invalid_email: The email does not have the correct format.
content.ERROR_signup_empty_password: The password field cannot be empty.
content.ERROR_signup_password_too_short: Sorry, your password is too short. Try at least 6 characters.
content.ERROR_signup_password_different: Sorry, your password confirmation does not match.
content.ERROR_signup: Sorry, this email already exists in our database.
content.ERROR_video_copyright: Sorry, this video cannot be played due to copyright issues.
content.ERROR_profile_not_available: Sorry, but this user doesn't have a space. Thanks.
content.ERROR_virtual_asset: Sorry, this content is only available on a web browser.
